item.title: Business Law
item.description: The day-to-day of business activity it is not a clear path. From advisement to litigation our firm provides a steady and experienced counsel to help achieve the businesses and companies goals, including advising factory management on issues related to industrial activity, property, and property maintenance, workplaces and factories, products, and dealings with any body belonging to the State Administration, with attention to Quality and Product Safety issues, industrial records, and Industrial Property.
